definition: relating to or especially immediately preceding or following the heliacal rising of Canicula (the Dog Star)
details:
adjective
- relating to or especially immediately preceding or following the heliacal rising of Canicula (the Dog Star)
= example: relating to or especially immediately preceding or following the heliacal rising of Canicula (the Dog Star)
- of or relating to the dog days of summer
= example: of or relating to the dog days of summer
